alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and Broward Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or near Miramar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Miami Gardens, Hallandale, Lauderhill, Weston, Doral, Oakland Park, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach and Miami Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
